102-50b @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badzra b+hai ra pa d+hA ra NI nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gzungs zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa/ dri ma med pa/ dri ma sel ba/ mtha' yas pa/ mu thug pa med pa/ dam pa sbyin pa/ shin tu rgya che ba/ thams cad bdag la mthun par rtag tu mtha' yas pa'i dam pa'i mchog stsol bar gyur cig /de la nga'i rdo rje'i tshig ni 'di dag go/ /a ra ra/ a sa ma/ sa ma tA/ a nan+ta d+harma tre/ kha NA kha NA/ ma hA bi re/ tsa les ma ma/ A sa hA/ ma hA ba le/ ka Na ka Na/ ma hA ba la A gri he/ ha ha badzra badzrA hA ye/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ hU~M hU~M maN+Da la/ sa ma pa ra a kra bi kra me/ ku ru ku ru/ tu ru tu ru sarba~M thA/ sarba hi/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ a kri ni phaT swA hA/ rig sngags dang gsang sngags thams cad kyi snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lan stong bzlas brjod byas na/ rig sngags dang / gsang sngags thams cad lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas par 'gyur ro/ /las gzhan thams cad kyang don yod cing thogs pa med par byed de/ dam tshig gsum pa'i cho ga las 'byung ba'i rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / snying

101
102-51a po dang / gzungs thams cad kyi nang na las thams cad byed pa yin no/ /de nas cho ga mi bzad pa/ rdo rje gtams pa 'dra ba ni/ /klu dang lha min srin bcas pa'i/ /sum cu gsum lhas mi shigs pa/ /de khros pas ni lhas mchod pa'i/ /brgya byin nyid kyang 'dar bar 'gyur/ /'byung po kun gyis ma smad pa/ /de ni srung bar byed pa'i mchog /ji ltar lhar bcas 'jig rten na/ /sangs rgyas 'dra ba'i ston pa med/ /bden pa'i tshig ni de yis ni/ /skye bo kun la bsrung gyur cig /tad+ya thA/ o~M badzra prA ka ra/ badzra prA ka ra/ badzra da~M Sh+TA/ b+ha lA ba hA/ tsu ru tsu ru/ pa ri tsu ma bi ke/ tsu lu te le/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo badzra b+hai ra ba s+ya/ ma hA ga na pa ti s+ya/ badzra shak+ti/ par+shu/ pA sha/ ha stA ya/ badzra ka na ka/ badzra bai DU r+ya/ a lang kr-i ta/ sha rI rA ya/ badzra pA Ni ra nu pA lA ya/ tad+ya thA/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ A na yA/ A na yA/ ma hA ga nA pa ti la g+hu la g+hu/ e hi e hi/ A kra ma A kra ma/ sha rI ra~M/ gr-i hI ta~M/ gr-i hI ta~M/ dr-iSh+Ta~M/ dr-iSh+Ta~M bA/ a tra bi sha tu sha rI ra~M/ kiny+tsa rA ya si/ bid+hu na/ bad+ha na/ pa Ta pa Ta/ kam pa kam pa/ rang ga rang ga /mo da mo da/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ bi dzr-i m+b+ha bi dzr-i m+b+ha/ pU ra pU ra/ g+hur+Na g+hur+Na/ A bi sha A bi sha/ shI g+h+ra shIg+h+ra/ ma hA badzra b+hai ra bo/ ga na pa ti rA dz+nyA+e pa ya ti swA hA/ cho ga la dgra thams cad rengs par bya ba dang / byad stems thams cad gcad pa la ni ba'i lci ba la dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la/ sems khros pas mtshon cha la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ sa la btsugs na de ma thag tu byad stems thams cad 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs bzlog par 'dod pas ni dbyug pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ de phyogs su 'phangs na dgra thams cad myos par 'gyur ro/ /klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na khros te rdo rje la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te bsnun na glu rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/ /ser ba zlog par 'dod pas ni rdo rje ha cang mi drag par bskor zhing / sgra yang ha cang gsang mi mtho

102
102-51b bar brjod na klu rnams ser ba mi 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /chang bsrung bar 'dod pas ni chang gi rdzas rnams yungs kar la lan bdun bsngags na thub par 'gyur ro/ /nad zhi bar 'dod pa la ni nad dang mthun pa'i sman nam chu la lan bdun bsngags te 'thungs sam byugs na nad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /las gang byed pa thams cad la'ang lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na bsams pa de grub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gzungs zhes bya ba ma rungs pa phyir bzlog pa rdzogs s+ho// //'phags pas gsungs pa'i gzungs rnams rnam mang yang / /rdo rje 'jigs byed zhal nas gsungs pa'i gzungs/ /bsrung bya'i las bdun ldan pa'i gzungs mchog 'di/ /kun gyi thun mong ma yin rnal 'byor dam pa'i gzungs/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po don yod rdo rje'i zhal snga nas bsgyur nas/ bod kyi ban+de skyo 'od 'byung la gnang ngo //
